Title: Guess how many snakes
Message:
If you can guess how many snakes are in the lolly jar (or closest guess to) then you may be going home at the end of this term with a giant stash of lolly snakes! 

How to play: 

$1 per guess or $3 for 5

When: Adam and ministry team will come around during PCG on Tuesday and Thurs/Fri 

Your donations will be noted with your total PCG donations so that it counts towards our Project Compassion inter-PCG comp. 

This will run until the last day of term - winner announced at our House Assembly next Thursday! 

GOODLUCK
